author: Odeinoichus
title: Manipulative Master of Mental Menace!
review:
Set #71020 Professor Hugo Strange: A powerfully important villain from Batman's Rogues Gallery, this menacing mastermind manipulates many and successfully deduces the secret identity of the caped crusader in many iterations. Dressed in a full body smock, using dual-moulded legs for his black boots and carrying two chemical beakers for no doubt nefarious purposes, Professor Strange includes a beard element and some nice printing on his face. The menacing scowl and silver mirror glasses are very nicely done.

With minimal detail printing Professor Strange's torso and legs are perfect for generic scientists in MOC lab scenes. So I feel that, despite what some may say, this character is great for some MOC potential. Overall he's a solid offering and stands in quite nice as a staff member for Arkham Asylum. Strongly Recommended.
